Control Statement: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to:                                                                                                           a. Perform configuration management during system, component, or service [Selection (one or more): design; development; implementation; operation];b. Document, manage, and control the integrity of changes to [Assignment: organization-defined configuration items under configuration management];c. Implement only organization-approved changes to the system, component, or service;d. Document approved changes to the system, component, or service and the potential security impacts of such changes; ande. Track security flaws and flaw resolution within the system, component, or service and report findings to [Assignment: organization-defined personnel].
